item.title: [Python] How to use Ass/Alembic with HtoA
item.description: #Introduction Every year elderly The annual Houdini Advent Calendar. I thought about what to write, but since I am only touching Arnold this year, I would like to write information that may be helpful in HtoA (Arnold for Houdini). Arnold is one of the renderers, Houdini(HtoA) Maya(MtoA) 3ds Max (MaxtoA) Cinema4D (C4DtoA) Softimage (SitoA) Katana (KtoA) Gaffer (Gaffer Arnold) Blender (BtoA) Others such as Golaem, Massive, Nuke etc. also support Arnold.
